item.title: Welcome to BIO210
item.description: Hello all, Welcome to BIO210, the entry level biostatistics course for undergraduates at SUSTech. The site is still under construction. Course material including lecture slides, extra reading material and homework assignments will be posted here, typical one day before the atual class. If you have any quesitons, you can ask in the QQ group. Regards, Xi
